TopicTitle: How to Get an Imgur album on the forums

Articles.Content: Hello, and I really need to know the awnser to this question. I have seen people put Imgur albums on the forums where you can click different images, but whenever I use the "Insert Image" tool, it never works for an album, even though it does work for regular pictures. Can you please tell me how to post albums?

[noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse]

So if your code is 4Q3SsF

[noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse]

you need to use imgur tags.

[ imgur ] album ID [ /imgur]

(Without spaces obviously)
crap, I think we've finally reached a time where you can date yourself by Googling something
